forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 67F. NNE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
